channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow snaps 3-day winning streak, U.S. stocks mostly fall as Treasury yields climb
TikTok parent confirms it fired rogue intern for tampering with its AI
item.description: The intern allegedly implanted a virus into ByteDance’s AI training program that impacted 8,000 graphics processing units.

item.title: Worries about deficit spending after election bog down U.S. government debt
Diddy team seeks gag order for witnesses and lawyers: They’re ‘assassinating Mr. Combs’s character’
item.description: Comb has remained incarcerated pending a May 5 trial after two judges denied bail in rulings being appealed to the 2nd U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals.

item.title: Why is Wall Street worrying about renters and younger borrowers?
Donald Trump’s policies would drain Social Security’s finances faster, report finds
item.description: Under Trump, Social Security’s trust fund would run out three years earlier than currently projected, according to the Committee for a Responsible Fed...

item.title: Biden extends student loan payment pause by 6 months for 8 million SAVE plan borrowers
item.description: Student loan payments for some 8 million borrowers will remain on pause for six months or longer, a spokesperson for the U.S. Department of Education ...

item.title: Burned out mental health workers in California are walking off the job, demanding better pay and work-life balance
item.description: Picket lines went up outside Kaiser facilities in Los Angeles, Orange, San Bernardino and San Diego counties.

item.title: Silver is breaking out and has potential to outperform gold ahead, says Katie Stockton
item.description: The technical analyst looks at charts on the iShares Silver Trust.

item.title: How the CEO of a major aerospace company totally rewrote his playbook after a $4.2 billion deal with Boeing fell through: ‘It was a baptism by fire’
item.description: The Brazilian plane manufacturer is enjoying a "harvest season" after a lot of turbulence.

item.title: AMD’s stock stands out from other AI names. What that may say about the market.
GE HealthCare announces time-saving AI tool for doctors who treat cancer
item.description: GE HealthCare announced a new artificial intelligence application it said will save time for doctors who diagnose and treat cancer.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock touches new intraday high as it heads for this milestone level
KKM Financial's Essential 40 stock fund is now an ETF
item.description: Many asset managers have been converting their mutual funds to ETFs in recent years, due in part to a 2019 SEC rule change.

item.title: The tax code could be in for upheaval. How to prepare your portfolio, per Bank of America
item.description: Key provisions in the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act are slated to sunset at the end of 2025. The Wall Street bank has a few tips for investors to get ready.
